Text: Sounds like Communist campaign.  Probably also full of Global-Warming tripe propaganda and Carbon-Communism regime talk.

So it's communism to point out that there's something wrong with the way things are going? Y'think there's nothing unusual in the USA's heat-wave & drought, or arctic ice-shelf collapses, or Greenland's ice-sheet melting early, or species going extinct by the hundreds?
You can just go back to obedient consuming, dude. Someone else will deal with it - maybe your kids.
